<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game5</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version5</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game6</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version6</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Autosaves the game (used for Retry). The game can then be loaded from the last autosave with [[loadGame]]. Will not save if the player is [[objNull | null]] or dead.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.88 a [[BIS_fnc_addScriptedEventHandler | scripted event handler]] [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/ScriptedEventHandlers#Events | <tt>"OnSaveGame"</tt>]] is available.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''saveGame'''

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[saveGame]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableSaving]], [[loadGame]], [[savingEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
